newsitem.title: LATVIA: LATVIA - NOON RADIO HEADLINES - MAY 8.
newsitem.headline: LATVIA - NOON RADIO HEADLINES - MAY 8.

text.p: These were the main headlines of the news reported by Radio Latvia on Thursday at noon. Reuters has not verified these reports and cannot vouch for their accuracy.
- Statesmen and foreign diplomats took part in commemoration events devoted to the victims of World War Two.
- A draft law on refugees goes into its first reading in parliament.
- Parliament will consider amendments to the law on and gambling which prohibits gambling in cellars.
